strength_details: Clear responsibilities focused on BI/DW reporting and ETL development
Established company (IBM) with global client base and delivery centers
Specific technical requirements (Cognos, UNIX, ETL tools) for focused role
concern_details: Vague on career growth, team structure, and development practices
Location restricted to Hyderabad, India with no visa sponsorship mentioned
Onsite requirement and 'relentless focus on quality' suggest potential for overtime
Heavy focus on legacy BI tools (Cognos) with limited modern stack exposure
best_fit_details: Mid-level engineers (3+ years) with BI/DW and Cognos experience
Candidates seeking stable enterprise environment with established processes
Those with ETL tool experience (DataStage, ADF, Informatica) and UNIX skills
probe_details: Ask about actual team size and composition in the Hyderabad delivery center
Inquire about career progression opportunities and technical leadership paths
Clarify the technology stack beyond Cognos and ETL tools
Understand expected work hours and any on-call requirements
leverage_details: Cognos Developer/Admin experience is a key differentiator for this role
BI/DW project experience with reporting/visualization is specifically required
summary.overall_assessment: Stable opportunity for mid-level data engineers seeking enterprise experience with IBM. Well-defined role focused on BI/DW reporting and ETL development with Cognos. Main concerns are limited modern tech exposure, vague career growth, and potential for overtime in onsite Hyderabad role. Suitable for candidates prioritizing stability over innovation.
